author: rcmatthews
msg: Change sizing algorithm for sizing two panes of tree browser.

author: rcmatthews
msg: Fixed outline not showing over resizing pane/column.

author: rcmatthews
msg: Modified resize border so it does not make the vertical or horizontal size zero when border is set up to ignore one of those planes; now passes through the wrapped size in that plane.  This stops resized views suddenly becoming very narrow, or short.

author: rcmatthews
msg: Made workspace icons and tree nodes behave in same way as icon in forms: they can now be double-clicked to open, and the view can be dragged onto the workspace to open it; also the view menu is now available for them.
